content: > **subscribe to my newsletter and get an exclusive 50% off coupon code for your first purchase > subscribe here 1 ** **there s a pdf pattern in english which provides an easy to follow step-by-step crochet instructions and a detailed photo tutorial** about the pattern the floral drift shawl is an easy crochet rectangle shawl pattern it features a simple double_crochet body followed by a lacy crochet flower pattern this can be a lovely addition to your wardrobe something light to put on your shoulders in a chilly evening or as an accessory for a formal dress skill level - easy crochet terminology - the pattern is written using english u s terminology materials needed - hooks size needed 3 0 mm - the shawl is crocheted with sport #2 weight yarn - total amount of yarn needed 480gr / 1 200m / 1 310yds for the shawl body 300gr/ 750m / 819yds for the flower lace section 180gr / 450m / 491yds finished size - can be made in any size you want look for the stitch multiple in the pattern notes 65x17 in 165x43 cm if you have any questions regarding the pattern feel free to contact me copyright © 2025 gootie agat rottman-cassel all rights reserved the design photos and video in this pattern are property of gootie you can sell the finished product on a small scale if you write about this product online please give credit to the original pattern return/refund policy due to the fact that it is impossible to return a digital file all sales are final this pdf pattern is free from viruses and safe to use it includes links to reputable websites however users should exercise caution when accessing external links from unknown sources gpsr representative ciara doyle c15 y5f9 ireland ciara@thefairythorn ie 1 https //madebygootie myflodesk com/ravelry-sign-up
